div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 78564009 (Pulse rate)

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct

description.value: Value sets with pre- and postcoordinated expressions from SNOMED CT representing different types of pulse rate measurements.
